hero.description: High-value, sustainable projects across Albania. Real estate development, construction, strategic investments, and project management.

overview.label: Company
overview.title: Overview
overview.description1: SouthBuild Invest is an Albanian investment and development company focused on creating high-value, sustainable projects across Albania.
overview.description2: Starting with strong opportunities in the south and expanding nationwide, we operate in real estate development, construction, strategic investments, and project management.

mission.label: Our Purpose
mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To invest, develop, and deliver high-quality projects that enhance communities, create long-term value, and set new standards in Albania's real estate and investment landscape.

vision.label: Our Aspiration
vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become one of Albania's leading investment and development companies by expanding our national presence, embracing innovation, and building projects that stand the test of time.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: High standards in every project delivered

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Modern solutions in construction and investment

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Long-term value for communities and partners

services.title: What We Offer
services.description: Comprehensive solutions for investment, development, construction, and project management across Albania

investment.title: Investment & Development
investment.description: Real estate investments, residential/commercial/tourist developments, land feasibility, joint ventures.
investment.longDescription:
Our Investment & Development services are designed to help you make informed decisions and maximize returns on your real estate investments. We specialize in identifying high-potential opportunities across Albania, from prime residential developments to strategic commercial projects and tourist developments.

With our comprehensive approach, we handle everything from initial land feasibility studies to joint venture partnerships. Our team combines market expertise with financial acumen to deliver projects that create long-term value for investors and communities alike.
benefits: Expert market analysis to identify high-return opportunities across Albania
Comprehensive feasibility studies ensuring project viability and profitability
Strategic partnerships and joint ventures to maximize investment potential
End-to-end development support from concept to completion

construction.title: Construction Services
construction.description: Residential buildings, villas, commercial spaces, renovations, full project execution.
construction.longDescription:
Our Construction Services division delivers excellence in every project, from luxury residential buildings and villas to state-of-the-art commercial spaces. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern construction techniques to create structures that stand the test of time.

Whether you need a complete new build or a comprehensive renovation, our experienced team manages every aspect of the construction process. We ensure quality, efficiency, and adherence to the highest industry standards throughout the entire project lifecycle.
benefits: Expert craftsmanship combined with modern construction techniques
Comprehensive project management ensuring on-time and on-budget delivery
Quality assurance at every stage of construction
Sustainable and environmentally conscious building practices

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.longDescription:
Our Project Management services ensure your construction and development projects are delivered successfully, on time, and within budget. We provide comprehensive oversight and coordination throughout the entire project lifecycle.

From initial planning and budgeting to final delivery, our experienced project managers work closely with all stakeholders to ensure seamless execution. We implement rigorous cost control measures and maintain detailed supervision to keep your project on track.
benefits: Professional project oversight ensuring successful delivery
Rigorous budget and cost control maximizing value
Detailed planning and scheduling preventing delays

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Market analysis, feasibility studies, urban planning, permits assistance.
consulting.longDescription:
Our Consulting services provide expert guidance to help you make informed decisions about your real estate and development projects. We offer comprehensive market analysis, detailed feasibility studies, and strategic planning support.

Our team of experienced consultants works closely with clients to navigate complex regulatory requirements, obtain necessary permits, and develop effective urban planning strategies. We combine local market knowledge with international best practices to deliver actionable insights.
benefits: Expert market insights helping you make informed investment decisions
Comprehensive feasibility studies ensuring project viability
Regulatory expertise streamlining permits and approvals
Strategic planning support for optimal project outcomes

detail.contactDescription: Contact us to learn more about how we can help with your project.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Showcasing our portfolio of exceptional construction and development projects across Albania.
projects.contactDescription: Contact us today and let's bring your vision to life. We're here to help and answer any questions you might have.

list.title: Luxury Residential Complex
list.description: Modern residential complex featuring sustainable design and premium amenities in the heart of southern Albania.

list.title: Luxury Villas
list.description: Exclusive luxury villas with panoramic views, premium finishes, and sustainable design principles.

list.title: Affordable Housing Complex
list.description: Quality residential complex designed for families, featuring modern amenities and sustainable design at accessible prices.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies. Learn more in our

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: SouthBuild Invest ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
content: Personal information you provide (name, email, phone number) when contacting us
Automatically collected information (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data and analytics information through Google Analytics

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
content: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
To improve our website and services
To analyze website usage and trends
To send you updates about our services (with your consent)

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, provided they agree to keep this information confidential.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
content: Object to processing of your data

sections.title: 7. Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies. For detailed information, please see our Cookie Policy.

sections.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.contact: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
content: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function properly
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website (Google Analytics)
Performance cookies: Collect information about how you use our website

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
content: Google Analytics (G-NJCNQ2ZVEX): Tracks website usage and visitor behavior to help us improve our services
Session cookies: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser
Persistent cookies: Remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them

sections.title: 4. Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. You can also use our cookie consent banner to accept or decline non-essential cookies. Note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

sections.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: We use Google Analytics, which may set cookies on your device. These cookies are subject to Google's Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 6. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Please review this page periodically for any changes.
